name: all-templates
description: In this example we configure all the templates in a single page

scripts.e2e: pnpm dev & pnpm dev:wait-boot && pnpm cypress && pnpm dev:teardown
scripts.dev:wait-boot: wait-port 4200 && wait-port 3001 && wait-port 3000 && wait-port 3002 && wait-port 5000 && wait-port 8080 && wait-port 8081
scripts.dev:teardown: kill-port 4200 && kill-port 3001 && kill-port 3000 && kill-port 3002 && kill-port 5000 && kill-port 8080 && kill-port 8081

author: Matteo Pietro Dazzi
